Pre-Game Insights: India whitewashed Sri Lanka in the three-match T20I series.
India will be high on confidence after the T20I series win.
Experienced players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, KL Rahul, and Kuldeep Yadav have joined the Indian side.
Rohit Sharma will lead the Indian side in the ODI series.
Riyan Parag, Shivam Dube, and Harshit Rana have earned their maiden call-ups to the ODI side.
Charith Asalanka has been named the new ODI captain of Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka's morale is low after suffering a whitewash in the T20I series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surface at R. Premadasa Stadium is expected to be a well-balanced one.
There is a 70% chance of rain predicted on the day of the match with temperatures in the mid-20s.
